tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mutation_name VARCHAR(255),
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT
);
CREATE TABLE Mutation (mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name TEXT, mutation_type TEXT, chromosome TEXT);
CREATE TABLE ClinicalData (clinical_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, mutation_id INT, diagnosis TEXT);

CREATE TABLE genetic_mutations (mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      gene_name VARCHAR(50),
                      mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
                      chromosome_number INT,
                      mutation_position INT);

CREATE TABLE clinical_data (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      patient_name VARCHAR(50),
                      age INT,
                      gender VARCHAR(10),
                      diagnosis VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE mutation_clinical_data (mutation_id INT,
                              patient_id INT,
                              FOREIGN KEY (mutation_id) REFERENCES genetic_mutations(mutation_id),
                              FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES clinical_data(patient_id));

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_position INT,
    mutation_effect VARCHAR(100),
    clinical_data_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE clinical_data (
    clinical_data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    mutation_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_id UUID,
    clinical_data_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id INT,
    gene_id INT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    effect_on_gene VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (mutation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
    gene_id INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome_number INT,
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE mutations_patients (
    mutation_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    mutation_status VARCHAR(20),
    date_detected DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (mutation_id) REFERENCES mutations(mutation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE clinical_data (
    clinical_data_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    clinical_notes TEXT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (clinical_data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)
